titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: INTERNATIONAL STAGING SYSTEM STAGE FOR RETINOBLASTOMA - National Codes

stentry.p: Stage 0: PATIENTS treated conservatively, grouped according to intraocular classification

strow.stentry: Stage I: Eye enucleated, completely resected histologically

stentry.p: Stage II: Eye enucleated, microscopic residual Tumour
b) Pre-auricular or cervical Lymph Node extension

strow.stentry: Stage IV: Metastatic disease a) Haematogenous metastasis 1. Single lesion 2. Multiple lesions b) CNS (Central Nervous System) extension 1. Prechiasmatic lesion 2. CNS mass 3. Leptomeningeal disease
